# Random module

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/random
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:27:29.786064

---

Module import path: /Verse.org/Random

- [`Verse.org`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg)
- **`Random`**

## Functions

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`GetRandomFloat`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/random/getrandomfloat) | Returns a random `float` between `Low` and `High`, inclusive. |
| [`GetRandomInt`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/random/getrandomint) | Returns a uniformly distributed, cryptographically-secure random `int` between `Low` and `High`, inclusive. (`Low` and `High` can be out of order.) |
| [`Shuffle`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/random/shuffle) | Makes an `array` with the same elements as `Input` shuffled in a random order. |
